[ODEPhysics.cc](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64/39/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_physics_ode/ODEPhysics_cc.html)
and
[BulletPhysics.cc](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64/39/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-quantal-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_physics_bullet/BulletPhysics_cc.html)

pullrequest.title: clean up ode code.  pass through some parameters used in vrc.

content.html:
I am tempted to deprecate

      public: virtual void SetParam(ODEParam _param,
                  const boost::any &_value);
      public: virtual boost::any GetParam(ODEParam _param) const;

and use

      public: virtual void SetParam(const std::string &_key,
                  const boost::any &_value);
      public: virtual boost::any GetParam(const std::string &_key) const;

but I haven't addressed that in this pull request yet, given there's enough changes here.

From that perspective, I don't want to add more enums.

Thoughts?

pullrequest.title: clean up ode code.  pass through some parameters used in vrc.

content.raw: I'm OK deprecating one of the SetParam() in other PR. If you plan to remove all the enums in the future, I'm fine with this solution too.
content.html: I'm OK deprecating one of the SetParam() in other PR. If you plan to remove all the enums in the future, I'm fine with this solution too.
